PathOfBuilding.Notes:
The BV guide: https://www.pathofexile.com/forum/view-thread/3324373
Issues: stuns phys mitigation: armour, evasion? leech / vitality (boosted by harbinger) determination / grace + hatred + vitality ?
Tips: Pickup lots of rare items Sell everything to vendors
Gems: Act 1 ^x70FF70Pierce^7 - mule ranger ^x70FF70EK^7 ^x70FF70Explosive trap^7 Caged Brute: ^x70FF70faster attacks^7 (1trans) ^x70FF70added cold^7 (1trans) ^x7070FF^x7070FFadded lightning^7^7 (1trans) Act 2, 18 ^xE05030cruelty^7 - quest reward / 1alt 4 ^xAF6025heralds^7 : 4 alterations Act 3 28 Sever the right hand ^x70FF70seismic trap^7 ^x7070FF^x7070FFvortex^7^7 31 Siosa ^xE05030Inspiration^7 (1chance) ^xE05030Shield charge^7 (1 trans) ^x8888FF^x7070FFPintpoint^7^7^7 ^7
Sockets: 3L: GGB: EK, cold, lightning 4L EK: GGBR, GGRR EK, cold, lightning, inspiration/cruelty 4L Seismic GBxx: Seismic, immolate, cruelty/lightning/cold/inspiratio Shield for ailment duration
Upgrades:
Early EK lvl 21 Hrimsorrow: 1c ------------ for freeze & dmg Karui Ward: 1c ------------ proj speed, proj dmg, ms, strength/dex Annoint proj 2c ------------ Fury Bolts: 2 verdant, 1 teal: 20% proj speed, 20% proj dmg, 20 str Boots 2c ------------ 30% ms Quartz Flask ------------ Bench Craft ------------ weapon dmg, life, res, Voidwalker 3c ------------ pierce, ms, phasing, avoidance, dex, but no life/res
Semi Heatshiver: 10c ------------ double the single-target dps Herald cluster 5c ------------ exposure for elementalist node. could still use frost bomb or cold mastery for bosses, but we haven't needed it, still instaphasing Gloomfang 1c ------------ chain should help to clear with the enchant Freeze cluster 10c ------------ idk not tested, might help clear? Annoint proj 10c ------------ Longshot: 1 teal, 1 crimson, 1 opalescent: 30% proj speed, up to 60% proj dmg
Late Enchant: 1div ------------ it's nice, but it can miss a lot of enemies - only 1-3 projs hit in front Militant Faith 80c ------------ mana cost + ailment imunity very nice Chest explode Weapon explode synthesis
Items: Gloves: hrimsorrow cold conversion / pierce / freeze spread asenaths Body armour: carcass jack (herald aoe+dmg) +2 level corrup crusader explode + 20% suppress, curse, spell crit, regen... Clusters: heraldry exposure, endbringer, harbinger sadist, blast freeze leech Hat: heatshiver + enchant circle Boots: onslaught Wand/scepter/dagger explode synthesis implicit +levels, cast speed, proj speed Shield +levels Amulet: +level, cast speed, proj speed Rings: -mana cost lightning damage (shock)
Tree:
Pantheon : Brine king BLEED
